compatibility.notes: The OGC-1.0 license is permissive and allows for integration with other permissive licenses without imposing restrictions. However, care should be taken when combining with copyleft licenses.

key_requirements: Ensure that the software and documentation are provided 'AS IS'.
Do not use the name and trademarks of copyright holders in advertising or publicity without permission.
license.name: OGC-1.0
obligations: Include the full text of the NOTICE in all copies of the software and documentation.
Include any pre-existing intellectual property disclaimers, notices, or terms and conditions.
Provide notice of any changes or modifications to the OGC files, including the date changes were made.
